text: Simon Woods (born 7 January 1980) is an English actor, playwright and writer. He is best known for his role as Octavian in Season 2 of the British-American television series Rome and in the 2005 Pride & Prejudice as Charles Bingley. Woods is married to fashion designer Christopher Bailey. ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:English playwrights Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:LGBT playwrights Category:LGBT actors Category:English LGBT people Category:Gay men
title: Simon Woods
